name: Black Mamba 1.2
description:
This is a long overdue ode to Kobe Bryant. 

Version 1.0:  The first time I watched this short was at John Williams event at the Hollywood Bowl. Kobe came out and read it. It was the most beautiful thing I had ever seen. I have always been a man that always excepted first and then have the rest. Kobe is no different for me. He was my hero and still is one of my heroes and the greatest basketball player to have ever live!!!

Also, check out this short dedicated to him I did not make this but I felt it was beautifully  done: 

Version 1.2: Swapped the Locations of the 4 and the 6 (sorry about my dyslexic moment), streamlined the code and got rid of unused sprites, and changed the sound of eating the fruit to a swish sound.





Please Note: I do not own Dear Basketball nor the youtube video it was taken from.
